attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the spiralling cost of the london olympics has already reached a massive 3.6 billion pounds. This is obscene when our roads and educatinal facilities
are in dissary. We as a public have been hoodwinked into believing we care about the olympics when in actual fact, when it has ended, we will be down  hundereds of millions of pounds and the olympic infrastucture will be wasted.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this issue http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
Please consider signing one of those, rather then creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
